bibl.title: Letter from Jefferson Randolph Kean to the Treasurer of Cuba, December 29, 1900

div1.p: Kean acknowledges the receipt of blank official checks.

div1.head: Letter from Jefferson Randolph Kean to the Treasurer of Cuba, December 29, 1900
div1.opener:
FROM GEN. J. R. KEAN
HEADQUARTERS,
DEPARTMENT OF CUBA
OFFICE OF CHIEF SURGEON,
HAVANA.
December 29, 1900.
To the Treasurer,
Island of Cuba,
Havana.
Sir:-
div1.p:
Referring to your request of December 6th, I have
the honor to hereby acknowledge the receipt of blank official
checks Nos.131601-131700 inclusive.
div1.closer:
Very respectfully,
Your obedient servant, JR Kean
Major and Surgeon, U.S.V.,
Actg. Chief Surgeon.
